phrs.translation: 型胶原, 上校, 胶原蛋白, 原蛋白
班菲萨松, 芭得里诺
用弓背敲奏, 用弓背奏, 弓杆奏法, 意〕弓杆击弦
紧随的旋律, 依旋律的速度而伴奏, 意〕紧随旋律

sentences.sentence: His successor at SOS was Col. Henry B. Sayler.
sentences.translation: 他在 SOS 的继任者是亨利 B. 塞勒上校。

sentences.sentence: Col. Gadhafi and his son Seif are in hiding.
sentences.translation: 卡扎菲和儿子赛义夫仍在躲藏。

sentences.sentence: Col Marks' phone call with his wife tore him up.
sentences.translation: 马克上校与妻子打完电话后，十分纠结。
